Select a difficulty level to start the game!

Different difficulty levels have different speed for falling block rows. Difficulty will also increase by every 15 seconds via decreasing gap distances between two coming rows. 20 points for each escaping row. 40 points if you speed up while you escaping. 10 points if you slow down while you escaping.

left: left arrow key

right: right arrow key

slow down (half scores): up arrow key

speed up (double scores): down arrow key

You can also use mouse click to move left or right
